name: Rohan
startIntroPart2: You have risen to power, and now the nation looks to you for strength and direction. Your neighbors will not leave room for peace, and you may need to forge your empire through force. But under your leadership, the Reich could grow strong enough to dominate its rivals and shift the balance of power in Europe—who can stand in your way?
declaringWar: We have waited long enough for you to submit to our strength. Now, you will face the consequences of your defiance as we take what is rightfully ours!
attacked: Your audacity to defy the destiny of our Reich shall be crushed under the iron will of the Aryan race.
defeated: Our dreams have crumbled, and the ashes of our empire will forever haunt this land. We fought for a vision that is now lost, and in the end, there is nothing left but regret.
introduction: Welcome, I trust you have come with purpose
hateHello: I would prefer not to speak with untermensch.
tradeRequest: Accept this offer, and you will be rewarded in time.
